title: Bobby Ate Sheep On ‘Running Wild With Bear Grylls' + Amy Doesn’t Want Her Son To Play Fortnite + Bobby’s Mailbag: Daughter Wants Tattoo Of SAT Score
itunes:title: Bobby Ate Sheep On ‘Running Wild With Bear Grylls' + Amy Doesn’t Want Her Son To Play Fortnite + Bobby’s Mailbag: Daughter Wants Tattoo Of SAT Score
description:
Bobby recaps his episode of ‘Running Wild with Bear Grylls’ including what it was like to eat a dead sheep. Amy’s son came to her and said he wants to download Fortnite on his tablet…she doesn’t want to let him. Bobby reads an email from a listener whose daughter wants to get a large tattoo of her SAT score and she wants to talk her out of it.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
